name: Cave!
description:
You stand at the entrance of a foreboding cave, having sojourned from your hometown, a distant memory at this point. You are in search of something very dear to you -- perhaps you will find it, perhaps you will find more, perhaps you will find only sorrow. Tread lightly, and treat your allies with care!

This is a lighthearted, very verbose, and slightly silly Twine game. Please enjoy!
